website_summaries.verdict: A sun hat that is understated in size. Comes at a decent price point and is available in many stylish colors.
pros: Paper blend sun hat with interior hatband
Has a 4-inch brim that is protective in most sunny conditions, plus it offers UPF 50+ sun protection
Comes in many colors, including black, ocean, rattlesnake, tropical multi, red
cons: Brim is attractive but not very stable and tends to blow around in the wind

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic sun hat to which I can easily add a scarf for extra flair
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these Betmar Gossamer sun hats, white and cobalt, because I appreciate having a basic well designed sun hat in different colors. The soft brim is four inches all around and the diameter of the total hat is about fourteen inches. The Texas sun is strong and it is nice to have the extra UPF 50 protection that this hat provides. The fact that this is a plain hat makes it ideal for me to personalize by tying silk scarfs around the brim. I love to coordinate my sun hat with my outfits and this style hat in so many color choices makes that easy.
customer_reviews.author: Bichon Mom

customer_reviews.title: Too big, too floppy for me
customer_reviews.text: Cute hat and good quality, but too large for my head. I'm an average sized woman, so I don't think my head is particularly smaller than most?! The fit cannot be adjusted so it just didn't work for me because it slipped down too low on my forehead and would have blown off very easily. Also, I found the brim to be too wide for my taste, but it would work well to shield from sun if you like this style. Deserves four stars because it is well made and attractive, just not right for me. I'll try another style - this one is going back.
customer_reviews.author: wdwfan1

customer_reviews.title: Cute but Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wish I loved this hat bc it’s cute. I measured my head and thought this hat would fit. It is pretty snug to the point that it is uncomfortable. I got it wet and tried stretching it out and that helped for a short while but the hat is now tight again. Still searching for a cute hat that fits my head. :(
customer_reviews.author: joanna f

customer_reviews.title: looks great on my round face
customer_reviews.text: Cutest hat ever, looks great on my round face. The brim is just right, not too large or small, i.e. it doesn't pop up when I tilt my head back. I recently came back and bought one in navy too.
customer_reviews.author: Toto

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Cute shaped hat but too big and floppy for me. Someone else may like it though
customer_reviews.author: SimplyWine

customer_reviews.title: Form AND Function
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this hat. We were both surprised how fashionable it looks, and she loves how it always bounces back into shape after being packed in a bag.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rambo

customer_reviews.title: Best hat ever
customer_reviews.text: Cutest hat I've ever found. I'm not really a hat person because they don't look that great on me. I've been on the hunt for years. My daughter had one and I ordered the same style and color myself. Love that it is crushable and will stylishly shield me from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended to keep the sun off your face in a ...
customer_reviews.text: I am petite and this hat doesn't overwhelm me. Highly recommended to keep the sun off your face in a beautiful and very chic way.
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hat for travel, every day use, sun protection
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing hat! I looked for so long on Amazon and in stores for a cute, natural straw-like hat with a wide enough brim that would shield my face and offer UPF 50+ protection. It's really comfortable and looks very stylish. It matches everything, as there is no colored band around the hat. Love it and would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: very nice, works great for my wife took a chance
customer_reviews.text: very nice, works great for my wife took a chance, and its good, thay should have sizes ,it would be nice
customer_reviews.author: reloc

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It arrived very wrinkled - took some time and a hair dryer to get them out
customer_reviews.author: Kecia Coby

customer_reviews.title: Way too fragile msterial
customer_reviews.text: I've worn it twice. Separating at the seams. On vacation I saw a lady with the same hat. Total back of hat hanging off. Way to fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife had the same product and this order was to replace it -- she loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis W. Benner

customer_reviews.title: Pretty But Stiff
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made hat. Attractive style. Pretty stiff. Not like previous Betmar New York Gossamer hats I own. I hope the wind doesn't take it off my head.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sun protection, foldable and fashionable style!
customer_reviews.text: Love this hat. Best sun protection hat and fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: They always look great
customer_reviews.text: I have them in 6 different colors and I get compliments when ever I wear one of them.
customer_reviews.author: happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice hat. Awesome cost.
customer_reviews.text: Really great hat for the price I paid for it. Thanks Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: C shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: A+ Amazon Seller! Highly Recommend! An Asset to Amazon! Great Products!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Gray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Travel Hat!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Great fit. Totally crushable. Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: P. Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Great travel hat
customer_reviews.text: This hat is exactly what I wanted - brim neither too small nor too huge. A good fit for me since my head is on the larger side!
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Versatile adjustable packable hat!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hat the beginning of June 2018. Perfect for days at the pool and to throw in a suitcase or tote. It DOES have a tie adjustment under the label to make the hat circumference smaller. Love how I can turn the brim of the hat up or down. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

product_meta.title: Betmar Women's Gossamer Sun Hat
product_meta.description: The Betmar gossamer is a fun wide brim hat that provides a delightful blast of color to your look. Not only does it look great, it also offers UPF50+ protection from the sun's uv rays. The gossamer is packable, so it's perfect for trips to the beach, hanging by the pool, and all your favorite summer activities
feature_bullets: Woven hat featuring engraved logo plaque
